title: Solving Logistic Equations #6
body: The population P of a koi pond over $$x$$ months is modeled by the function $$P(x)=\frac{68}{1+16e^{-0.28 x}}$$.
pacedSpeech: The population P of a koi pond over x months is modeled by the function P of x equals the fraction 68 over 1 plus 16 e to the minus 0. 28 x
